response.name: Get Config Success Example
response.body:
{
    "userInfos": {
        "imagePath": "https://mediastorage.richemont.com/damdatastore/QuA/vca/",
        "storeName": "Houston - River Oaks District",
        "priceIncludeTax": true,
        "storeId": "a0R4E00000Du6CzUAJ",
        "photoUrl": "https://vancleefarpels--retail--c.documentforce.com/profilephoto/7294E000000O5r8/F",
        "id": "0052p000008MZmNAAW",
        "currency": "EUR",
        "lang": "en_US",
        "email": "dev@balink.net",
        "lastName": "Dev",
        "storeCode": "3088",
        "firstName": "Balink",
        "name": "Balink Dev"
    },
    "SAs": [],
    "queries": [
        {
            "id": "clientQuery",
            "name": "Clients",
            "query": "SELECT Is_Contactable__pc, toLabel(Is_Contactable__pc) isContactableLabel, Last_Sale_Date__pc, LastName, PersonMobilePhone, FirstName, Birthday_Month__pc, Segment__pc, PersonEmail, OwnerId, Turnover__pc, convertCurrency(Turnover__pc) Turnover__pcConverted, Id, Birthday_Year__pc, First_Sale_Date__pc, Birthday_Day__pc, LastContactedDate__c  FROM Account WHERE Id != ''  AND Main_Store__pr.Store_Code__c = '3088'"
        },
        {
            "id": "productQuery",
            "name": "Products",
            "query": "SELECT COM_CLEANING_DESC__c, WBR_Interchangeable__c, WMF_Size__c, COM_Marketing_description__c, Id, COM_ENGRAVING_DESC__c, CRE_Collection_Product_Line__c, COM_THEMATIC__c, toLabel(COM_THEMATIC__c) thematicLabel, COM_TOTAL_CARATS_BY_GEM__c, Product_Family__c, WMO_Power_Reserve__c, WMO_Function_Type__c, Size_Adjustment_Value__c, WMF_Water_Resistant__c, COM_SPECIFIC_HIGHLIGHTS__c, CRE_SAP_Reference__c, Name, PIM_CRE_JMF_SIZE_INT__c, COM_SUB_COLLECTION__c, toLabel(COM_SUB_COLLECTION__c) subCollectionLabel, COM_REPLACEMENT_STONE_DESC__c, COM_size_adjustment__c, toLabel(COM_size_adjustment__c) sizeAdjustmentLabel, CRE_PRODUCT_TYPE__c, JMF_MAIN_MATERIAL__c, toLabel(JMF_MAIN_MATERIAL__c) mainMaterialLabel, CRE_JMF_STANDARD_SIZE_RANGE__c, COM_POLISHING_DESC__c, WBR_Self_Interchangeable__c, COM_PRODUCT_LAUNCH_DATE__c, CRE_Limited_Edition__c  FROM Product2"
        },
        {
            "id": "stoneQuery",
            "name": "Stones",
            "query": "SELECT Quantity__c, Id, STO_COLOR__c, Product__c, STO_CUT__c, TOTAL_CARATS__c, STO_TYPE__c, toLabel(STO_TYPE__c) typeLabel, TOTAL_CARATS_UNIT__c  FROM Stone__c"
        }
    ],
    "picklists": [
        {
            "values": "86400;172800;604800",
            "objectName": "Event",
            "labels": "1 day before;2 days before;1 week before",
            "id": "1566732695526Reminder__cEvent",
            "fieldName": "Reminder__c",
            "controllingFieldValue": null,
            "ControllingFieldName": null
        }
    ],
